name: Asteroids Ballz
description:
Download in the Play Store -> Download here!

Will you survive among so many asteroids?

Feel the nostalgia of the retro game with the new Asteroids Ballz.

Will you be able to beat your own record?

Play for infinite hours and enjoy its features:
- Infinite levels
- Upgrade your ship
- Buy new ships for battle
- Switch between different scenarios
- Retro music
